Title: Bamboo Bears
Description: ["Bamboo-Lee, Dah-Lee, and Slo-Lee are three bears with a goal: to save the world before more species become extinct. But can the bears stand up to the spineless villains behind Ratco Corporation? With Ai-Ai the pink dragon on their side, they may be able to rescue the environment before it's too late."]
Related: ['Adaptation: Ai Mai Mii', 'Prequel: Choboraunyopomi Gekijou Ai Mai Mii', 'Side story: Choboraunyopomi Gekijou Dai Ni Maku Ai Mai Mii: Mousou Catastrophe Special', 'Sequel: Choboraunyopomi Gekijou Dai San Maku Ai Mai Mii: Surgical Friends']
